title: President Trump Announces Presidential Delegation to Attend the Inauguration of His Excellency Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
January 4, 2021
President Donald J. Trump today announced the designation of a Presidential Delegation to attend the second Inauguration of His Excellency Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo, President of the Republic of Ghana, on Thursday, January 7, 2021, in Accra, Ghana.The Honorable Dr. J. Peter Pham, Ambassador, United States Special Envoy for the Sahel Region of Africa, will lead the delegation.Member of the Presidential Delegation: 
The Honorable Stephanie S. Sullivan, United States Ambassador to the Republic of Ghana
